## Scope
- [ ] Protocol (UnityLink / UnityGPU / TLVs / registries)
- [ ] Server
- [ ] UnityIEC proxy/cache (future)
- [ ] Test vectors / tooling
- [ ] Docs only

## Motivation
What problem does this solve? Why now?

## Proposal
Describe the change at a high level.

## Protocol impact (if any)
- Additive only? Breaking?
- New message(s) / fields?
- Required caps / limits?
- Failure modes + status codes?

## UnitySTEAM direction
How does this move toward library/installs/updates/saves/multiplayer/spectate?

## Alternatives considered
What else could we do?

## Implementation notes (optional)
Anything that makes it easier to implement or test.
